Articles.Content:
You have to build a craft that fits in with the stock craft as much as possible (with description) 

you can also continue a series of crafts in the game, for example you can make the albatross 1, because there's only an albatross 3, but they have to fit in with the others (dont continue the ravenspear series with a mk3-super-heavy-15-engine-ssto-vtol-saturn-v or something)
